website_summaries.verdict: An effective and affordable white/pink/brown noise machine.
pros: A favorite of parents and light sleepers for is simple, effective sounds

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware—Item is NOT Eligible for Return!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware—I recently purchased this white noise maker based on the 'steller' reviews and the item being 'Amazon's choice' product. However, after I received it, it has flimsy power adapter, the number of white noises is super limited, and my baby disliked it. To my surprise, the item is NOT eligible for return—I don't know why. There's really no reason for me to keep an expensive white noise maker that doesn't work. I'm super disappointed and wish I was notified of the return policy before I checked out!
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Work is bearable once again - co-workers avoid tragic ending
customer_reviews.text: Moved into brand spanking new office space that is so quiet you can hear every flatulence, chip crunch, carrot bite, soup slurp, (boorish) conversation, whisper or otherwise, every phone call (if I concentrate hard enough, both sides), keyboard click, mouse movement, tummy rumble, foot step (nicknamed a couple new clod hoppers), sniff, sneeze, coffee slurp, burp, soda can opening, staple punch, paper printed, knuckle cracking annoyance from every inch of the 4000 square foot expedient path to nightmarish hell ... Then the LectroFan arrived. Peace came. Will to live returned. Murderous thoughts dissipated. Does exactly as is says on the tin. You should buy it. You should buy two. Countless co-workers owe you their lives. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sanity Restored

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this sound machine, much louder than machines that we have had in the past. However, after a couple of days, the outer casing on the machine began to vibrate while the sound machine was running. The noise of the vibration was extremely noticeable and distracting when trying to sleep. I will add that the machine was never dropped or jostled. I would expect more from a $50 product.
customer_reviews.author: morgan king

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE - NO RETURNS ALLOWED
customer_reviews.text: We ordered via Amazon Prime and the machine worked for the first hour, then a new sound started and it seems like a speaker is broken. I hoped to return it since it's defective, but THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN. So now I'm stuck with a broken speaker and I'm out $50. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: It is a great quality sleep machine while it works. We have used it every night for my son for about a year. It has been well cared for (not mishandled) yet it stopped working (unable to turn up volume and making static sound) after less than a year. I’m disappointed it would quit working in that time frame. At this price point I had hoped to get years of use out of it. Would have loved it if it had not died in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Crackling noise even at medium volume
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sounds and how loud this can get but there is a distinct crackling noise in the speaker while even at medium volume and if you turn up the volume it gets really bad. I think i am going to have to return it and i know this was mentioned by other people in the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Andy Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great product - five stars
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and my neighbor makes a lot of noise (especially in the early mornings) LECTROFAN does a good job , it washes out many types of noise (thumping, furniture moving and most importantly low pitch bass). You can select type and the volume of sound (it has 10 types of fan sounds and 10 levels of white noise). “Large Fan” with slightly higher volume (than the default setting) works best for me. I’m very happy with this product. I paid $49. Note : It may take few days before you feel totally comfortable with it, particularly if you are not used to sleep with white noise (such as in planes).
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: DESIGN CHANGED FOR THE WORSE
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these from 2014 and one from 2016. The one from 2014 still works awesome. The one from 2016 is already broken because they changed the cord design. On the new ones, you can no longer unplug the cord from the device and so, now the cord comes loose and causes static over top of the white noise which is the opposite of relaxing. If you can get an old one, great- if you can only get the new version, forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin P

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: This sucks. It makes a fan noise and a white noise. Nothing great- definitely not worth $50. Tried to return but was denied.
customer_reviews.author: Meechelios

customer_reviews.title: I originally loved it. The problem with this is that I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally loved it. The problem with this is that I've had it for a month and it no longer works. I can not exchange it for a new one and this makes me very sad.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: I can finally sleep through the night
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible purchase. I haven’t even thought about outside noise since I brought this bad boy into my life. I am an EXTREMELY light sleeper and fixate on any noise I hear. I moved into a house next to the bus line in a not so quiet neighborhood and this has solved all of my issues. No question one of the best amazon purchases I have ever made. It also helps my 10 week old puppy sleep well through the night as we no longer hear the incessant barking of our neighbor’s dog. If you seek silence, this is where you should begin.
customer_reviews.author: comp5330

customer_reviews.title: Most Sounds are grating on the Nerves!
customer_reviews.text: This machine advertises as have a wide variety of sounds available. Its really only 2 sounds and the rest are variations of the 2 basic sounds. Most of these are grating on the nerves. I am a trauma therapist and needed something for white noise in the background. There is NO WAY I could even consider using this product. And, I am not even able to return the item, based on the seller's no return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, Poor product, fake reviews
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This thing has to have fake reviews. It is no where close to sounding like a fan. It sounds like you’re being invaded by extraterrestrials. Also you cannot send it back. Might end up using it for Halloween to scare small children at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Osborncris

customer_reviews.title: Helps me fall asleep fast!
customer_reviews.text: This really helps me to fall to sleep fast and stay asleep. My husband passes out before he hits the pillow when this is on. Usually it takes me forever to fall asleep. Now I turn this on and drift away into a peaceful slumber. My husband gets up every morning at 4 am and before having this little noises or him just rolling out of bed would wake me. Now I sleep right through. Very helpful for anyone having a hard time falling asleep or staying asleep
customer_reviews.author: James Bergtold

customer_reviews.title: Cure for Nightshift
customer_reviews.text: So I am relatively new to shift work, and was having a very difficult time getting good sleep during the day. Kept waking up early, and was generally mad at the world when this happened (where my night shift people at?) My girlfriend recommended a noise machine, and to be totally honest I thought it was kind of silly. She let me borrow hers, and I slept for 7ish hours and woke up feeling way better then I had been for a few months. Did some research, bought this machine and it’s a must have for me now. Can’t recommend it enough, especially if you’re working night shift. Happy sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Kent McLay

customer_reviews.title: Not good sound , Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: This fan sounds very fake . Wish I would have bought a different type of machine . I tried to return it but amazon saying it is not returnable . Beware if you don’t like it you won’t be able to return it .
customer_reviews.author: Meghan S

customer_reviews.title: What’s a good night of sleep worth to you?
customer_reviews.text: Life-changing product ❤️ I love this sound machine. For the last week, I’ve sleep so peacefully. Have slept with fans running for years but as I’ve gotten older I’ve had problems staying asleep. As a woman still experiencing night sweats, there have been awful nights where I’m too tired to get up, yet unable to fall back to sleep. Was reluctant to spend $50 on a machine that hums but now I know it gives me get the healthy sleep I need which is well worth it. Thanks to the reviewer who recorded full demo of sounds and operation that I read before placing order - well done!
customer_reviews.author: AusTexRed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Find
customer_reviews.text: This LectroFan was recommended by a friend. Overnight, sleep was constantly disturbed by noisy neighbors outdoors, and their noisy pets. On the first night that I received it, I plugged it in, and immediately all the outside noises were non-existent. Previous to this machine, I was using another white noise machine that worked okay. This LectroFan is definitely the best, with volume control, and different settings. It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: 78run

customer_reviews.title: The Best Sound Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many sound machines including apps on my phone. They never quite fit the bill. My husband and I recently went on a trip and the hotel Provided this exact machine. It was awesome! The fan settings are so real and natural. Not Too much, just the perfect white noise to help you sleep. We came home and I ordered one. My daughter, who also runs a fan at night fell in love with it so i ordered another one for her. She also loves it. Great product! Highly recommend for people who sleep with a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Avid shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an entire year!
customer_reviews.text: As my daughter will soon be turning 1, I realized that the LectroFan High Fidelity White Noise Machine has practically been on in her room 24/7/365. Yes it is a (small) waste of electricity but we put it underneath her crib so turning it on/off is a major nuisance. And it helps her fall asleep and stay asleep. Let me repeat that: it helps her sleep and stay asleep. (Need I say more?). This a massively reliable product that delivers as promised day and night. I've bought 1 more since and plan to buy more for my office, gifts for other new parents, etc. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: BKBoMa

customer_reviews.title: 5 years old and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: When searching Amazon for a little padded travel case for this, I realized that I never did a review. At 5 years old, the machine is still going strong. I have a 2nd one at another home in Montana and never had a problem with that one either. Absolutely love this machine and how it gives various choices. Depending on where I am, the different noises needing to be drowned out sometimes require different sound selection from the machine to be effective. Now I just wish they made some kind of padded or hardsided traveling case for it. Right now I use a camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have been using 10 days. Worked great. Comes with cord and USB charger. Then I tried using the built in USB charging port on my power strip (to free up a plug spot) but it's not strong enough for the item so it kept turning off and on. I thought it was broken! Using the included USB plug works. I suppose some other charges will work but the plug is only USB on the one end. The other end looks like a typical 3mm type plug charger. Anyhow, we've been using it for a while now and it works well. Love it. Plus when you turn it off it keeps the settings from the last time you used it.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyesMN

customer_reviews.title: Great for insomnia
customer_reviews.text: One natural way to fight insomnia is having a sleep routine as well as a droning sound in your room as you try to sleep. This mimics several different old school can sounds that canm help you relax since they are repetitive, but also because this can block out distracting sounds outside of your room like traffic, a loud tv, or a noisy person in the next room. Volume is adjustable from quiet to very loud. This was well worth the money since it has allowed my daughter to sleep a lot better even though she suffers from insomnia.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!! So not buy- you CANNOT return it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a sound machine that I believed was this exact one a few years ago. Shame on me for not looking closer because the one I have has actual music and various sounds- I use it for my kids. I bought this one the other day so both kids will have one, not realizing that it only plays annoying “fan” noises and even more annoying “white” noises. I’ve never bought anything on amazon that can’t be returned and I’ll never buy from this company again as a result. I’m now stuck with a sound machine I’ll never use and wasted good money on.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I definitely get a good night's sleep these days
customer_reviews.text: 'LECTRO FAN SAVED MY LIFE Seriously though I would give this thing a hundred stars if I could. Apartment living can be testing at times, and this thing blocks out talking, tv playing, barking, street noises, you name it. Even can block out some music thumping if it isn't too loud. I don't know how I lived without it. I definitely get a good night's sleep these days. Well worth the money. There is no noticeable looping whatsoever and the timer is wonderful! It has a wide variety of noises to choose from and you can then change the pitch so I think there is something for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cass Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Opionion
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and helped me sleep better right up until I accidentally gave it a small shock while turning it on. It was not even a bad shock. So before you touch this thing be sure to discharge any static electricity on your finger or you will have an expensive paper weight! It probably needs to be better insulated. Other than that the design is a bit retro and it would be nice to have an indicator to see what setting it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Flight Guy

customer_reviews.title: Vetted by an urban dweller that gets 24/7 construction noise!! A++++++++
customer_reviews.text: This is so freaking great. I've been using white noise machines for years and years but ended up finding this through some inane Buzzfeed article. My old machine had looping audio and drove me insane, so the fact that this is non-looping is everything. It's also very sleek and modern. I live in downtown Boston with construction sites literally boxing me in my building with noise nearly 24/7 between that and cops/fire trucks. This knocks out the noise and allows me to sleep or nap at any time of day without hearing anything.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival not Eligible for return!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and does not turn on and “no eligible for return”. How can something be amazon choice and prime eligible but you can’t return a product that was dead on arrival. Unbelievable. I’ll be fighting this with my credit card company.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A difference maker for a good night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who had a noisy neighbor above her. She was really starting to suffer from the neighbor's late night loudness. We assumed he had a wheelbarrow full of dead body parts he was moving from one end of his apartment to the other every night at ungodly hours. Fortunately for my friend, the white noise produced by this bad boy fixed everything. She can now sleep soundly through the night and although she needs to keep her door shut to avoid being part of the possible crime scene upstairs, life is back to normal for her.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe’s Human Slave

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a replacement to my old/busted sound machine ... after a lot of research I’m really pleased I landed on this. Great range of white noise and fan sounds and great volume control. I keep it on 24/7 in my master bedroom and can’t hear any of the norm downtown sounds. I have a second in my downstairs bedroom/dog room, also on 24/7, my corgi no longer barks at every sound as it completely drowns out the city noises. Very happy! If you’re looking for nature sounds this isn’t for you but otherwise recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mellow sound
customer_reviews.text: I have used white noise machines for 50 years. Started with the mini fans inside a plastic housing. The mini fans worked until I married a man whose snores would wake the dead. This machine has a lower tone that matches the snore sounds. I can adjust the loudness from soft to fully masking the snores. My husband agrees that the sound quality is the best we have tried. The item is small, the controls are easy to use, it is a fantastic sound machine. I recently gifted my niece with one to use when her first baby is born. I'm sure she will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget! Especially for babies!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new baby. It is a lifesaver. Love that it saves my settings and I can switch instantly between the higher frequency sound and low rumbly white noise sound. This is the best thing I have in my mama tool belt. And by the way Their customer service is AMAZING and will work with you and respond to emails instantly. This is the best experience I've ever had with an online product. Recommending this to all new parents!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katelin R.

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have insomnia and the only way I can sleep is with a sound machine. Now I don't need waves, rain or birds chirping all I need is the sound of white noise. White noise like a fan or air conditioner. I love this sound machine because it is simple. This machine only has a fan noises and white noise sounds. I can adjust the volume and type of sound I want. I love the way I can customize the sound to exactly what I need to get a peaceful, restful sleep. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: MJ VanHecker

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark, Too Depressing
customer_reviews.text: Although having so many options for white noise and fan sounds, the whole thing was just dark and soul-suckingly depressing to listen to. It did tune out my tinnitus, so I guess it serves its purpose, but I found that nature sounds work much better for me - rain and wind and ocean covers the tinnitus better, and keeps me calm and serene at the same time. If you don't suffer from Anxiety Disorder or Depression, it works well and the numerous options allows customization. But if you have any of those conditions...cripes, this won't help you at all.
customer_reviews.author: lovebird

customer_reviews.title: Constant fan sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I used to use my phone and a BTooth speaker. It was ok because that’s all I’ve ever used. I never liked the slower type sounds ie drips, light rain or slow moving water. This new product has only fan sounds that you can adjust. It also has another mood but I only use the fan sounds. It quite relaxing and it rounds out some external noises. All you hear is the fan and since it’s a constant noise your not anticipating the next drop of water or wave etc.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE - don't bother... Just find a YouTube white noise video
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap (in the bad sense), and the sound seems small, that is, not full. I tried to return mine and this item is NOT returnable, because it's classified as 'personal' but have no idea why. My recommendation: Just find a YouTube white noise sound you like and run it through a quality (Bose) wireless speaker, and then you'll have a nice variety to choose from with a full sound. And you can use the speaker for any other good sound.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Best sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I went on a vacation and stayed with a friend who had a young baby. She had the sound machine which she used to drown out the noise when her baby was sleeping. This sound machine can go extremely quiet or extremely loud. It has one of the best realistic sound qualities of white noise or fan I have ever heard. After buying one and seeing how great my daughter loved it, I ended up buying four more so every member of my household had one. They All love them including my in-laws.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Probably THE best Amazon purchase we've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Probably THE best Amazon purchase we've ever made. For 40 years I slept with a fan on and my wife never liked the breeze that much. This little box does a perfect job of sounding like any one of 10 different fans, each with adjustable volume. And it sounds full like a real fan (not like some hissy little noise box) which is a real surprise considering how small it is. If you need a fan without the wind, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: TJH

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super glad I bought this! It’s really easy to use and has a bunch of different sounds to choose from at any volume you like. I’m a really light sleeper, and I used to wake up every time my roommates left for work, but now I leave this thing on every night and I only wake up if they’re being extra noisy. I was worried at first that having a constant noise in my room would trigger my migraines, but after a minute of having it on I don’t even notice it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 years and going strong! No more lost sleep from barking dogs
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without this little gem of a thing. There are lot of barking dogs in my neighborhood who bark at all hours. Nothing wakes me up now. I can even nap during the day. This sound doesn't loop like others do, which can really drive you crazy when you're trying to fall asleep. This just sucks you into dreamland. I bought one for my daughter for her babies and it really helps a baby get conditioned to sleep and masks any sounds in the house. I've been thinking about buying another one for backup. I would hate it if this company stopped making it. This is an essential item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Marycontrary

customer_reviews.title: Great to help Sleep 😴
customer_reviews.text: My sleep has really improved since I got this! My friend uses it to put her baby to sleep each night and he sleeps really well even if we are making noise, so I got one for myself. There are a lot of different pitches to choose from but among them there’s only one I like. But that one is perfect for helping me fall and stay asleep. It has a timer but you can also let it run until you manually turn it off. Plugs in so no need to deal with batteries. My quality of sleep is much better with this! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Darton

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using either a fan or humidifier to have white noise to get to sleep. I have also tried some white noise apps, but the loops of sound is irritating. Since using this sound machine just a couple days ago I have noticed that I am sleeping all through the night and getting a very restful sleep! I wondered why this was all of a sudden and then realized it is coincident with purchasing this machine. I can only say - wow! Very much appreciated and recommended. Lots of choices to find exactly what you want to hear. Thanks for a great product :)
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: great product for a limited time
customer_reviews.text: The sound is electric while not appearing to have a looped sound where one can tell the repeat point. We have four of these units in our home and are used nightly. The sound machine last for ≈2500 hours (<8mon) before the unit stops working. We've replaced three units, with the same product, at about the same time point for each unit. As stated above- great product for a limited time.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and options
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been able to sleep without noise for years now. I’ve had two different noise machines that worked ok but generally only had one sound that I preferred. Before this purchase I used a box fan. However, this machines settings for both fan and white noise are fantastic. There’s a reason the reviews are stellar! So many options and nearly all of them are something I could fall asleep to. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Turley

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve found.
customer_reviews.text: Nice number of fan selections that I’ve used to replace a box fan. Although the white noise settings just seems to annoy me. Volume is fantastic for such a small box anywhere from a whisper to sounding like your standing in a commercial Freezer unit. Most importantly I think is the fact it keeps generating sound constantly instead of the usual looping sound track heard on other sleep machines.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible noise and not available for return? Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing...fortunately I bought this along with another machine, so once I compared them, I was able to tell how inferior this sound was...so fake machine like, and while they offered many sounds, there was not a single one I could imagine sleeping to. So, I go to return like 1 of the 1000 other Amazon products throughout my lifetime, and it's not available for return? Hideous. I wouldn't even gift this thing away. Now I'm out $50. Do yourself a favor and buy the product that is gorgeous, works with a smart phone app and rhymes with "lose."
customer_reviews.author: Emily 4Pats

customer_reviews.title: Lots of choices so you can find your perfect white noise
customer_reviews.text: I believe I sleep better with white noise, especially when traveling to a place that has street noise. This product has done a very good job at that. However, last night my husband and I were rudely awakened by a loud voice saying "Low Battery, Low Battery, Low Battery." We went back to sleep, and about an hour later the same thing happened. I pulled the plug. Unfortunately my sleep was disturbed for the rest of the night. In the morning we looked the product over and found there is no visible battery that needed to be replaced. The product needs to be plugged in to work. I would welcome the manufacturer to explain this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really does a good job of masking
customer_reviews.text: I have a large masker due to having tinnitus. It's a real pain to lug on trips so this one looked like it would fit the bill. It hardly takes up any space on the nightstand. This is nice because it's close to the bed and the adjustments are easy to reach if you need to change the volume or type of noise. It's so convenient to move it from room to room and it surprisingly puts out good volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I was looking for something for a sound similar to fans, besides just actual fans. It can get pretty loud and really helps with blocking out noises. It's a convenient size, fits in the palm of your hand, so it would be very easy to travel with. You just plug it in, choose the kind if sound, all diff kinds of fan sounds to choose from. Then you choose if you want a lower pitch, like brown noise, or a very high pitch like white noise. There are 10 options to choose from with fan type and also with the pitch. It would be hard not to like this. Actually planning on ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok but does not remember previous setting when turned off at outlet
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a better rating were it not for the fact that it does not remember the setting if you turn off the power from the outlet instead of the unit itself. I've always used a wireless remote control with other sound devices with no problem but, unfortunately, with this machine the sound defaults back to factory unless you use the power button on the device. The unit has a nice variety of sounds but the fact that I cannot use a remote control was a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: but that is how much I love this sleep machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this item. The first one had a charging cable that was not well-suited for travel and eventually broke.. but that is how much I love this sleep machine.. I take it everywhere. This new model has a charging cable with a removable cord which makes it MUCH better for travel. It has many different settings and it works very well at overcoming my husband's horrific snoring. I recommend this item for anyone who has a snory partner in bed.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable -- but who cares?
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to order this -- but when it wasn't exactly what I was looking for I found out IT IS NOT RETURNABLE. And then I started using it. And realized... I was happy I couldn't return it. I use it every night pretty much, and during the day for napping. I don't particularly like the "fan" noise settings but there is one setting in the other set that sounds like a perpetual downpour of rain. Or a waterfall. Or something. It's great. Blocks out passing cars, noises from the neighborhood, and other things that might normally wake me up. Result? A good night's sleep. That is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: mvh

customer_reviews.title: Cannot possibly be improved!!!
customer_reviews.text: To drown out ambient noise and assist in sleep, I use a white noise generator. After using one of those fan-type white noise generators for a couple of years, I noticed my adult (and much smarter) daughter had bought one of these. I should have; but I'm glad I finally did. It is small enough to take on trips, but produces a clean uninterrupted rich set of sounds that should please anyone. I especially appreciate the non-looping lack of periodic interruption and the easy controls (sound selection, volume, etc.). This machine does the job fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a $20 HomeMedics noise box from Walgreens where the power/volume knob crapped out to where we had to spack it like the Fonz to get it to work and it would randomly cut out. Also, like the box fan phone apps, there was sometimes an undercurrent of a repeating digital signal that sounded like some sort of subliminal morse code message that was apparently programming me to over eat and chronically masterbate (not simultaneously). This one has a great analog sounds and is dead simple dummy proof. Also very heavy and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: When you want to shut out the world.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine to replace the fan [noise] that is typically running throughout the rest of the year. I live next to a high traffic street and wanted something to drown out the noises for those times when I didn't want my fan blowing. This does the trick. Highly recommend. I will be ordering a second one once the price goes down again. ;) As mentioned by other reviewers, it is great for sleeping. I wake up refreshed. I wish I had one of these years ago. It is amazing how effective it is for masking noises. If you're on the fence, get this one; you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: JBeanie

customer_reviews.title: Very small yet can get VERY loud if needed which is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely five stars!! I bought it to dampen the sounds outside my home office when I'm talking to clients. I like that it's very small and the sound can be adjusted to very very low to very very high. Great that it has a variety of sounds as well. Perfect for my home office needs! Also, it's perfect for dampening out the sound of my son having way too much fun hollering loudly at midnight while playing video games on the weekend. :-)
customer_reviews.author: PIA

customer_reviews.title: favorite purchase!`
customer_reviews.text: I bought this noise machine last year when amazon was having their black friday sales, this is my favorite purchase I've made since then. I suffer from insomnia and find that this really calms me down from having my mind race at night. I've grown to really enjoy the wind/tunnel sounds they have. I travel around for work and I never forget to bring this with me wherever i go. I'm really happy I got this :D
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and easy in use
customer_reviews.text: This device is so tiny I thought it would be just ok, but omg I was wrong. This machine makes pretty powerful sound and super simple in use. My baby girl sleeps like a champion now. We have one story house so we needed something in her room to cancel some noise from outside and when we are watching tv or have ppl over. I am very impress with it, the only regret I have that I didn’t buy it earlier ( my baby is 10 month old now)
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the first nine months.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this little guy for the first nine months I had it. It was exactly what I needed and was looking for. Unfortunately, at about the nine month mark it started making a reverberating humming noise across all volumes and modes. I tried to contact the company for a replacement but got no response. Oh well, I might try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Where the Wild Ones Are

customer_reviews.title: I run 3 of these in my bedroom at night!
customer_reviews.text: Currently, there are three of these running in my bedroom! I love this thing. I live in a robust metro area, so street noise is an issue. Now that I have my "White Noise Vortex" in action, though, I sleep like a baby! For most homes, you just need one to do the trick - I just like being surrounded by the consistent sound, and there have been some amazing deals on this lately. I ALWAYS bring one with me when I travel, and it's a lifesaver in a hotel room. (No more elevator sounds, hallway noise, or next door neighbor shenanigans interrupting my slumber.)
customer_reviews.author: Laura F.

customer_reviews.title: You will sleep at night!
customer_reviews.text: We live about half a block from the train tracks and next to a post office. Needless to say there are trains and trucks driving by our second story apartment at all hours of the night. We bought this and are very happy with how it works. It’s drowns out about 90% of the outside noise which is amazing. We still hear the cats scratching at the bedroom door but I don’t think that problem will ever be resolved lol.
customer_reviews.author: whostheboz

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought on the recommendation of The Wirecutter. We have this one and its competitor. This one produces electronically-generated sounds while the other is a fan whose sounds are modified by rotating baffles. I prefer the sound from the mechanical one, but that might be more a matter of taste. This one has two controls: one for volume and another to cycle through the sounds. The volume control works ... exactly as you would expect and it's fine. Cycling through the sounds on the other yields changes whose differences are almost imperceptible to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Townley

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this white noise machine. I purchased it for my baby girl. We started using it immediately at night with her. She loves the white noise. The machine is now 3 months old and still going strong. We have not had one problem out it. My husband and I sleep with a box fan going at night and we are very tempted to buy one of these machines for us as well. I couldn't recommend a better machine. All the different white noises and fan noises, you shouldn't have a problem finding one to soothe you.
customer_reviews.author: TNJ2007

customer_reviews.title: BEST AT ANY PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: SO good!!!! NO HIDDEN NOISES EITHER!! We have burned through a few over the many years we have been using a white noise machine...all but this one has little repetitive noises one of us (wife or I) notice when we are falling asleep...crazy, but must be part of the program of some brands...we found this one when staying in a hotel that had a passenger train route that started to increase train traffic by the hotel....this was their answer and we not only loved it, but have three now... one at the parents house, one in the RV and one in bedroom...buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sound choices!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small unit that packs a great sound! I prefer the brown noise. It works well to mask noises that would normally wake me up (such as acorns hitting the deck). There are lots of sound choices and volume choices. I bought this to replace a fan I was using for the same purpose. Saves a lot on electricity!
customer_reviews.author: GMB

customer_reviews.title: Not a loop like other devices I have used
customer_reviews.text: I am a very light sleeper. I use a large air purifier at home to block all noise. I have not used this at home. I take it when I travel to friends and hotels. It does not block 100% of the noise, I would say it blocks about 85-90%. Not a loop like other devices I have used. This is easy to use with several different sounds. I slept with it on the night stand and it seemed to project the sound around the room (could not tell exactly where the white noise was coming from), especially compared to other devices I have tried. This is a necessary item when I travel!
customer_reviews.author: Otis the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: So first off, I didn’t realize how small this thing was going to be. So I was a little worried it wouldn’t be able to fill our master bedroom with quality sound. It works really well. Tons of options, loud enough, sound quality is good. And it’s small enough that we can easily travel with it. Which will make hotel rooms so much more bearable!! I’ll be buying more for our guest rooms. I have tried tons of sound machines over the years and this one is the best I’ve used by far. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Manty

customer_reviews.title: The only sound machine you will ever need!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other sound machines, this one is the best by far. Runs until you shut it off, remembers your last setting, and there so many to choose from. I live in an apartment under disrespectful hillbilly redneck stoners who walk like elephants and practice anvil dropping and bowl in the middle of the night. With this machine, I don't hear a thing! Now I don't have to worry about how I'd look in orange or prison stripes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for sensitive sleepers
customer_reviews.text: great product, I normally would keep on my fan to get that constant noise to keep out outside noises so I can sleep, I'm a very sensitive sleeper. Although now a days I find myself keeping it on all the time b/c its very calming. This product is absolutely great, I use the fan option or one of the white noise options. and I love the fact there is a volume so I can turn it up if needed. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I use this every night and love it. There are many sounds and frequencies to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night and love it. There are many sounds and frequencies to choose from to mimic white noise, brown noise, fan sounds and more. Volume ranges from very quiet to very loud. I have had no issues at all and love this product. Very much worth the money considering all of the cheap machines that I have bought were awful.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Seddon

customer_reviews.title: SO effective, a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Live in a FORMER quiet townhouse,Now I have toddlers (screaming day and night) on all sides.Live close to the beach.So no air-condition .Windows stay open. I would loose my mind if not for this machine. Drowns out EVERYTHING.The day after I received, next door to my bedroom, neighbor started getting construction/remodeling.It even drowned that out. Amazing. I like different fan, and white noises.Many choices. One will work.Purchased a cheaper nature sounds machine on here.Red Rooster.To keep by my computer, next to a sliding door across from some very spoiled ,screaming toddlers.(and parents, ugh.)Not as great.way lower volume.But a couple settings, actually drown out enough,to muffle,.but not for sleep.This is my star, though. If they ever do nature,Im getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Michele by the sea

customer_reviews.title: Worked great ... for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This morning it began to stop and start. Defeating the entire purpose. I checked all the wiring. It’s fully connected to electricity. My daughter has two of these. They are fading in and out and cutting in and out. Prior to this I used an old, refurbished radio/white noise from Amazon. It was still going strong when I gave it away after 13 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Yup, we like it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this and says it needs more/different sounds like an a/c unit running. She also tells me she likes it and uses every night. I think it doesn't quite sound like the real thing, but it is close. And i like the fact that it doesn't loop. I do not like looping, so this is a great feature. I have heard the type used in offices and they seem okay to me, i like the option of having different sounds and loudness and not just loudness. I also like the fact that it does not have any moving parts. Time will tell how long this unit will last. I'm guessing for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MarcA

customer_reviews.title: Every bedroom has one
customer_reviews.text: We live next to a railroad and highway so this helps immensely with helping the kids stay asleep with the noise that happens randomly. There are number of different sounds and it gets extremely loud which is nice. Also I have not heard any loops (a slight pause when it gets to the end and restarts at the beginning) that a phone app might use which can be very distracting. We run our sound machine 24/7 in sound machines so its nice to not hear that pause.
customer_reviews.author: David Truong

customer_reviews.title: Recommended - with some concerns
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality product. It is small but mighty. It is absolutely effective in shutting out the noises that keep me awake. My only concern is that after I’d had it less than 2 months, the volume control started behaving very strangely. The good news is that I notified the manufacturer and they sent me a brand new one lickety split - I didn’t even have to return the defective model. I would recommend this product - although it still concerns me that my first one only lasted a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson G. Cates

customer_reviews.title: I need white noise to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for 1 night but it worked great. I am a newlywed and I always needed a fan to sleep. My husband does not like any noise to fall asleep. I finally bought this hoping it would be loud enough for me but quiet enough so he wouldn't hear it. Last night I had it on my nightstand and I put it very low. It ran all night and it was the best sleep I have had since getting married 9 months ago. I wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeys2277

customer_reviews.title: What's up with the huge price change?
customer_reviews.text: We love this product so much that we own 3 of them, one for each bedroom. We've previously used the Marpac, but we vastly prefer this one because of the ability to adjust the volume lower than what is possible on the Marpac. But, Amazon, what is going on with the huge price jump? On Nov 23, we ordered one for $38.96. Ever since, the price has been $49.99. We had wanted to buy one for a family member as a Christmas gift, but we'll pass given the 29% price hike.
customer_reviews.author: KateinMak

customer_reviews.title: LectroFan, will you marry me?
customer_reviews.text: LectroFan is the greatest thing that has ever happened to me. It's as loud as a jet engine so I can drown out the inconsiderate and intolerable noise from the world around me. It may be my best purchase ever. If my apartment is on fire, this is the first thing I'm grabbing when I run out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fall asleep faster with this
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to drown out the noises of our horrible neighbors. Their kids would ride around on ATV's at 3am and blast music. It didn't cover up their sounds, but I grew to love this sound machine and now I use it every night. As soon as i turn it on, my body knows it's time for bed. I think it's helped me fall asleep much faster. I liked the sound options on this one better than other brands i've tried. There are different fan noises and white noise to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Small but Effective
customer_reviews.text: All my life, I've been very sensitive to sound. For years, I've slept with a sound machine. I moved into a new apartment, and quickly realized that the walls were pretty thin and I could hear my neighbor's every move. I wanted to get another sound machine to keep out in the living room to mask the excess noise. When this arrived, I looked it how small it was, and figured this was never going to be enough. I was super wrong. This little machine kicks out steady white noise, and effectively masks the excess noise from outside of my apartment. I forget it's running most of the time, which is a good thing. Would definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Boyle

customer_reviews.title: If you like those high pitched tv static type sounds
customer_reviews.text: There are many different fan sounds and white noise sounds on here. I have to be honest, I find most of them unlistenable, but this is true for most white noise makers including apps for iphone. There is one very deep, mellow fan that works perfectly for my wife and I, though. Different people have different preferences, I suppose. If you like those high pitched tv static type sounds, those are on here too. Seems to be very sturdily built and haven't had any problems with it after many nights of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fully adaptable machine as to volume and white or fan noise.
customer_reviews.text: I sleep odd hours. A noise blocker is a must. This new LectroFan is a wonder. It adjusts in volume from soft to wind tunnel and gives you two choices of the type of noise. It takes up a small space, but makes a BIG white/fan noise if you need it. Love it! Do I ever hope it lasts and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased a 2nd one - ten years later
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews, and the ones I write tend to be based on problems I have with a product. However, I thought I would write a brief one about this noise maker. We bought one originally 10 years ago and it has been on every night in my daughters room without fail for all 10 years. If you are looking for just clean white noise without some frog or cricket chiming in, this one is perfect. We just had another addition to the family and purchased this one for her room.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Saved my marriage
customer_reviews.text: Well not actually saved it, My wife can't sleep without white noise and another 1000+ different perks so we used to sleep with a fan. An actual fan year round, even in WINTER. That fan was the only thing that made her sleep (I can sleep standing up so I couldn't care less) So one day I simply bought this little fella and plug it in. Used all my psychic powers to convince her to try one night with this thing instead of a fan and guess what. Now we're happily sleeping together ever after.
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: The Best Sound Machine on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality sound machine. No looping recordings so you don't find yourself focusing on the clip repeating! Very loud and clear sounds. Instead of a ton of useless annoying sounds that no one uses, this gives a huge variety of frequecy ranges for the most useful sounds so that the noise frequency can be selected to almost perfectly block out any annoying noise! This is the Only Sound machine I will ever use now! Actually, I bought multiples just in case it went bad, but have not had to use them yet since the first one has lasted several years with no issues or sound degradation.
customer_reviews.author: IamKrusty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound replacement device if you are using a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've taken the time to review a product I bought on Amazon. I have been running a fan in the bedroom for white noise but in the winter it is counter productive in keeping warm and producing the white noise I've gotten use to, so I researched the web and found this item. It's small but produces a loud sound. Great for travel, this item is perfect, very satisfied, don't often give products a five star, but this is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: my sanity thanks this machine
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely sensitive to noise. My downstairs neighbor comes home from work at midnight and brings his friends over to hang out until 3am. They talk very quietly, but the vibration of their voice travelled through the walls and floor still bothered me. Until I bought this little machine. The first few nights, I slept for 10-12 hours. I didn't hear a thing. I love this machine so much. so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built well, works well
customer_reviews.text: Great item. The volume control allows for both very loud and very quiet settings, so the range of noise is excellent. The two sounds, white noise and fan noise, both sound pleasant and sound as expected. I personally prefer the fan noise. I like that it remembers the volume level when I turn it off and back on. I considered buying the Marpac Dohm Classic, as my mom has had it for many years, but I decided on this machine because of the greater customization, both of volume and sound type. I live near a busy street and have this on all the time. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newborn, to drown out noises while he slept. We'd always used a floor fan, but then it broke so we decided to try this white noise machine. I love it. It's small and compact, so it doesn't take up a lot of room. You can raise or lower the volume. I wish we had bought it for our other kids when they were babies.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine was exactly what I was looking for! I’ve been sleeping with a fan on for years. In these winter months it’s been too cold to run my fan. I still need the sound to stay asleep. I’m impressed with the amount of fan sound options and also the white noise options. The sound quality is also impressive. The fans sound realistic like they’re in the room. It’s slightly smaller and sturdier than expected which is a pleasant surprise. It’s nice to have a choice between 2 colors. I’m very glad that I bought this. I find myself using it during the day when there’s noise pollution coming from outside. I’d definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Fuller Life

customer_reviews.title: Better than Marpac Dohm.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Marpac for my first baby who is now 2. I went to order a second for our newborn and saw this one. Thank goodness! It's so much better! It sounds just as good and the sound is nice and round, but it's not a fan! It's louder, has more options and doesn't heat up. My Marpac is always warm after running all night in my 2yo's room, which makes me nervous. This also replaced my large loud bedroom fan which I couldn't sleep without. My husband is happy to no longer have air blowing at his face all night. :P
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found this very useful at the time me and my daughter are going ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this very useful at the time me and my daughter are going to sleep.i used to turn on the fan for the sound ,but in winter is cold and I can't use my fan; so with the Letro fan whitenoise, it blocks all the sound I hear outside my windows because my neighbors are terrible with a music in high volume at 12:pm or 1:00pm with party that never ends.i finally resting in peace my nights
customer_reviews.author: Angela terrero

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize I needed this, glad I got it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people that has to sleep with a fan. Not a big deal until Winter rolls in, and my need to sleep with a fan has now negatively affected me and my husband. Imagine trying to sleep while breathing through a stinging cold nose, not to mention my chest cold wasn't getting better because of the cold! Enough was enough, and with a bit of research I stumbled upon this gem. The fan noise is perfect, there's no audible looping, and it even has the "bassy-ness" a real fan has. Very seriously recommend, don't be like me and deal with many unnecessary extra-cold Winters.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an actual fan and I love it so far. The fan sounds are soothing and high quality, no looping. It helps mask small sounds that would normally wake me up. I bought this after being disappointed with the big red rooster sound machine which was too high pitched.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully on vacation and at home
customer_reviews.text: Used this on our trip to Disneyworld since we were all in one room. It helped my one year old and 8 year old sleep through my husbands snoring... I’m assuming I don’t snore ;) We have used it at home since we’ve been back and it seems to be helpful to drown out sounds that can sometimes wake him up. Like when we finally get him to sleep and we do our slow ninja-like creep out the room and he hears that one creak in the door or crack of the floor and it wakes him up... it seems to help with that so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. Laborie

customer_reviews.title: So  many perfect white noise sounds to choose from
customer_reviews.text: my girlfriend works night shift and i don't want the kids to wake her up, also we watch tv at night and i don't want the tv to wake the kids, this thing is amazing, the sound is so peaceful and doesn't bother any of us but it drowns out noise and keeps everyone happy. It is smaller than i expected, thats good i guess if you need the space, i highly recommend it ,we already sleep with a fan on and this makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Ben to Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud but i hear background music recorded into the white noise sound i like
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second purchase to use for my second child’s room but i definitely notice background music playing from the sound machine. They must have recorded the white noise while music was playing in the background. Its faint enough so it’s not too bothersome but i definitely hear it... along with the base of the music... not sure if all the sons have background music recorded as well but for the white noise choice i made, the music is there. Overall though, i like the volume and does what i need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!! Search no more!
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, gets loud enough, and one of the white noise sounds reminds me of the peaceful hum of flying on an airplane. I love this fan!! I’ve had 3 Homedic ones that all broke after a year. I have the ohms and they don’t get loud enough. I own 5 of these. I use with my kids and for me. I absolutely love this white noise machine and think it’s far superior to than any other noise machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amit&Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good for noisy office neighbors.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound machine. We just moved into a new office space with very thin walls and our neighbors are a little loud when conducting business. We decided to get a couple sound machines to help block the noise, these did the trick. The ability to adjust the volume and type of sounds has been great. It was a very nice find and great buy, saved our sanity!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Essential for a sound night of sleep
customer_reviews.text: An absolute game changer. We had a mechanical white noise machine, but it didn’t get loud enough to drown out our inconsiderate upstairs neighbor and her constant stomping. This thing has volume and bass, and lots of options to adjust sound and volume. If it cost triple the amount it did, I’d still buy one.
customer_reviews.author: David Negron

product_meta.title: Adaptive Sound Technologies LectroFan High Fidelity White Noise Sound Machine with 20 Unique Non-Looping Fan and White Noise Sounds and Sleep Timer
product_meta.description: Style:Classic| Color:WhiteLectrofan is ideal for relaxation, study, speech privacy, or any situation where you'd like more control of your audio environment. It's also your personal white noise and fan sound machine to ensure a better night's sleep and peaceful rest. The LectroFan offers twenty unique digital sounds to help block noises, and you can choose from ten different electric fan sounds and ten variations of pure white noise. All sounds can be personalized with pin-point volume control to select across a wide range of sound levels - from a whisper, to many times louder than mechanical fan based conditioners.
feature_bullets: Buy with confidence. Lectrofan is designed in the USA and backed by a 1,000 day satisfaction guarantee.
Provides ten fan sounds and ten ambient noise variations, including White noise, Pink noise and brown noise
Helps block disruptive environmental noises so you or your little one can fall asleep with ease
Safe, solid-state design is powered by AC or USB and dynamically creates unique, non-repeating sounds with no moving parts
Precise volume control allows you to set the perfect level for your unique environment
Also ideal for creating a disturbance-free work area, or just reducing the distracting effect of outside noises for a more relaxing environment, day or night

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
